column1: We're all here to help our good friend, Chef, who has touched our lives in the past.  I remember when I was just starting out, Chef suggested I buy a pompadour hat. I thought he said, "Bite the head off a bat", so I did. And the rest, oh, it's just history. Now, let's go crazyyy! Ain't nowhere to run Ain't nowhere to hide  Aarrggghhh!!!
You kids  don't  around with your  mom!
